channel.title: Error with runserver on a fr33sc4p3 based server
channel.description:
I need help, when I click on runserver I get this problem, I think that the numbers mean the line it is on so I will also post the lines with the error:
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: " 3626" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:1408) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:23) at server.main(server.java:29) Starting fr33sc4p3 Server on 0.0.0.0:43594[/code]
Now here is the lines with the error, I am also aware it says different files. P.S is used NetBeans to analyze the line 1408 problem because it would take forever to count to that.
[code]NpcHandler errors: Line 1408:newNPC(Integer.parseInt(token3[0]), Integer.parseInt(token3[1]), Integer.parseInt(token3[2]), Integer.parseInt(token3[3]), Integer.parseInt(token3[4]), Integer.parseInt(token3[5]), Integer.parseInt(token3[6]), Integer.parseInt(token3[7]), Integer.parseInt(token3[8]), GetNpcListHP(Integer.parseInt(token3[0])), true);
Line 23: loadAutoSpawn("autospawn.cfg");
Server.java: Line 29: npcHandler = new NPCHandler(); [/code]
Please help ASAP :(

item.title: Error with runserver on a fr33sc4p3 based server
item.dc:creator: @pmgz2 pmgz2
item.description:
@pmgz2 wrote:

[quote=“blakdaddy, post:9, topic:112145”]thats an inanimate error.

Its basicly the server compiled incorrectly, just recompile[/quote]

Are you like Not smart!? he didn’t put the correct amount of spaces between each coordinate thats why he got that error -.-.

Read full topic

item.title: Error with runserver on a fr33sc4p3 based server
item.dc:creator: @pmgz2 pmgz2
item.description:
@pmgz2 wrote:

nah just do this, the part that you were working on, in autospawn.cfg delete it and rewrite it because you didn’t use Tabs, you CANT use spaces because then you get that error, use tabs. one tab per the Coords. Name (tab) xcoord (tab) etcc.

try it now:edit:

spawn = 2862 2911 3612 0 0 0 0 0 0 Death spawn = 1019 2917 3610 0 2924 3626 2898 3600 2 Fire elemental(hell) spawn = 1019 2917 3610 0 2924 3626 2898 3600 2 Fire elemental(hell) spawn = 83 2917 3610 0 2924 3626 2898 3600 2 Greater Demon (hell) spawn = 83 2917 3610 0 2924 3626 2898 3600 2 Greater Demon (hell) spawn = 1019 2910 3611 0 2924 3626 2898 3600 2 Fire elemental(hell) spawn = 1019 2907 3605 0 2924 3626 2898 3600 2 Fire elemental(hell) spawn = 1019 2911 3605 0 2924 3626 2898 3600 2 Fire elemental(hell) spawn = 1019 2917 3620 0 2924 3626 2898 3600 2 Fire elemental(hell) spawn = 83 2907 3611 0 2924 3626 2898 3600 2 Greater Demon (hell) spawn = 83 2907 3611 0 2924 3626 2898 3600 2 Greater Demon (hell) spawn = 1019 2914 3614 0 2924 3626 2898 3600 2 Fire elemental(hell) spawn = 83 2914 3614 0 2924 3626 2898 3600 2 Greater Demon (hell) spawn = 83 2914 3614 0 2924 3626 2898 3600 2 Greater Demon (hell) spawn = 1019 2906 3615 0 2924 3626 2898 3600 2 Fire elemental(hell) spawn = 83 2906 3615 0 2924 3626 2898 3600 2 Greater Demon (hell) spawn = 83 2906 3615 0 2924 3626 2898 3600 2 Greater Demon (hell) spawn = 1019 2909 3620 0 2924 3626 2898 3600 2 Fire elemental(hell) spawn = 83 2909 3620 0 2924 3626 2898 3600 2 Greater Demon (hell) spawn = 83 2909 3620 0 2924 3626 2898 3600 2 Greater Demon (hell) spawn = 83 2910 3603 0 2924 3626 2898 3600 2 Greater Demon (hell) spawn = 83 2910 3603 0 2924 3626 2898 3600 2 Greater Demon (hell)

Read full topic

item.title: Error with runserver on a fr33sc4p3 based server
item.dc:creator: @Blood_Lust Blood Lust
item.description:
@Blood_Lust wrote:

I need help, when I click on runserver I get this problem, I think that the numbers mean the line it is on so I will also post the lines with the error:

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: " 3626" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:1408) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:23) at server.main(server.java:29) Starting fr33sc4p3 Server on 0.0.0.0:43594

Now here is the lines with the error, I am also aware it says different files. P.S is used NetBeans to analyze the line 1408 problem because it would take forever to count to that.

[code]NpcHandler errors:
Line 1408:newNPC(Integer.parseInt(token3[0]), Integer.parseInt(token3[1]), Integer.parseInt(token3[2]), Integer.parseInt(token3[3]), Integer.parseInt(token3[4]), Integer.parseInt(token3[5]), Integer.parseInt(token3[6]), Integer.parseInt(token3[7]), Integer.parseInt(token3[8]), GetNpcListHP(Integer.parseInt(token3[0])), true);

Line 23: loadAutoSpawn(“autospawn.cfg”);

Server.java:
Line 29: npcHandler = new NPCHandler(); [/code]

Please help ASAP

Read full topic
